execution_plan.description: Retrieve every customer's first name, middle initial, last name and their payment method(s) by joining customers with customer_payment_methods. Use a LEFT JOIN so customers without payment methods are included.
execution_plan.query: SELECT c.customer_id, c.customer_first_name, c.customer_middle_initial, c.customer_last_name, pm.payment_method_code FROM customers c LEFT JOIN customer_payment_methods pm ON c.customer_id = pm.customer_id;
